title: ISic020468. ISic020468
body:
1Σκύτᾱ ε̄̓μί με̄̀ θίγε̄ς

1ΣΚΥΤᾹΕ̄ΜΙΜΕ̄ΘΙΓΕ̄Σ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Dubois (IGDS 1) ;
  • Arena: φίγε̄ς (= θίγε̄ς).

English translation

Valentina Mignosa

I belong to Skytas: do not touch.

Italian translation

Valentina Mignosa

Appartengo a Skytas: non toccare.

commentary

The name Skytas may appear in another inscription on pottery from Gela, in which it is, however, partially integrated. The same formula occurs, although in the present tense and not in the imperative as in this case, in a funerary inscription from Thera: με θίνγανε (IG XII 3, 451). The formula is probably intended for potential thieves of the vessel, perhaps used in the case of particularly well-made items. It is also found in a well-known inscription from Cumae (DGE 786) hὸς δ’ ἄν με κλέψει, θυφλὸς ἔσται.

bibliography

  • Dubois 1989 148 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187
  • Arena 2002 21, pl.IX.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373
  • Schwyzer 1923 786 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001230
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
